程序包 org.giiwa.conf

类 Global

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.giiwa.dao.Bean
      • org.giiwa.conf.Global

  • public final class Global
extends Bean
    The Class Global is extended of Config, it can be "overrided" by module or configured, it stored in database
    作者:
    yjiang
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
